content.body:
> <@dereknongeneric:mozilla.org> sideshowbarker: is `#css` on `irc.w3.org` still a thing or has that channel been bridged to somewhere else? (have some questions about how CSS modules being imported to JS should behave)

#_w3c_#css:matrix.org should work (Matrix bridge to #css on irc.w3.org) — but Element seems to have some problem with actually exposing it

content.body:
* `#_w3c_#css:matrix.org` should work (Matrix bridge to #css on irc.w3.org) — but Element seems to have some problem with actually exposing it.
Looking at the #css channel in my IRC client, I can see that Matrix did actually let me join it. But for some reason Element just doesn’t load as a room.

content.body: connecting to it from my IRC client seems legit lol
so far all the Matrix clients (except the Element web app seem too far behind on the whole Spaces concept to be worth the bother for me)
